overview: I am a registered investment adviser representative in what appears to be an over advised world. Advising on public and private company investment decisions. I have managed a boutique investment and consulting firm for four years, with services on both the public and private side of the market. Have started a few companies, nothing to write home about, most are still operating. I have advised clients globally, on investing and company strategy. Have discovered a passion for the start-up industry, which has led me to the private company dark-side of advising and investing. I have tried helping entrepreneurs in any way possilbe, trying to help them not make the same mistakes I have. Now trying my hand as a striver in the start-up industry.
